mapper.sql: gift_order_id, gift_order_code, gift_order_status, customer_id, pay_time, send_express_time, get_goods_time, shopping_addr_id, shopping_province, shopping_city, shopping_county, shopping_address, shopping_person, shopping_phone, shopping_mobile, shopping_postcode, del_flag, order_integral, express_price, temp1, temp2, temp3, temp4,create_time,order_num
mapper.insert: insert into np_gift_order (gift_order_code, gift_order_status, customer_id, pay_time, send_express_time, get_goods_time, shopping_addr_id, shopping_province, shopping_city, shopping_county, shopping_address, shopping_person, shopping_phone, shopping_mobile, shopping_postcode, del_flag, order_integral, express_price, temp1, temp2, temp3,create_time,order_num) values (#{giftOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{giftOrderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendExpressTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{getGoodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shoppingAddrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shoppingProvince,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shoppingCity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shoppingCounty,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shoppingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoppingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoppingPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoppingMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoppingPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderIntegral,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{expressPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{temp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT})

gift_order_code, gift_order_status, customer_id, pay_time, send_express_time, get_goods_time, shopping_addr_id, shopping_province, shopping_city, shopping_county, shopping_address, shopping_person, shopping_phone, shopping_mobile, shopping_postcode, del_flag, order_integral, express_price, temp1, temp2, temp3, create_time, order_num,

mapper.update:
update np_gift_order
gift_order_code = #{giftOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gift_order_status = #{giftOrderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_express_time = #{sendExpressTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
get_goods_time = #{getGoodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shopping_addr_id = #{shoppingAddrId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
shopping_province = #{shoppingProvince,jdbcType=BIGINT},
shopping_city = #{shoppingCity,jdbcType=BIGINT},
shopping_county = #{shoppingCounty,jdbcType=BIGINT},
shopping_address = #{shoppingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shopping_person = #{shoppingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shopping_phone = #{shoppingPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shopping_mobile = #{shoppingMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shopping_postcode = #{shoppingPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
order_integral = #{orderIntegral,jdbcType=BIGINT},
express_price = #{expressPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
temp1 = #{temp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temp2 = #{temp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temp3 = #{temp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temp4 = #{temp4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where gift_order_id = #{giftOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update np_gift_order set gift_order_code = #{giftOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gift_order_status = #{giftOrderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_express_time = #{sendExpressTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, get_goods_time = #{getGoodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shopping_addr_id = #{shoppingAddrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shopping_province = #{shoppingProvince,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shopping_city = #{shoppingCity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shopping_county = #{shoppingCounty,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shopping_address = #{shoppingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopping_person = #{shoppingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopping_phone = #{shoppingPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopping_mobile = #{shoppingMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopping_postcode = #{shoppingPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_integral = #{orderIntegral,jdbcType=BIGINT}, express_price = #{expressPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, temp1 = #{temp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temp2 = #{temp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temp3 = #{temp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT} where gift_order_id = #{giftOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select gift_order_id, gift_order_code, gift_order_status, c.customer_id,c.customer_username, pay_time, send_express_time, get_goods_time, shopping_addr_id, shopping_province, shopping_city, shopping_county, shopping_address, shopping_person, shopping_phone, shopping_mobile, shopping_postcode, o.del_flag, order_integral, express_price, temp1, temp2, temp3, o.create_time,gift_name,gift.gift_price, province_name,district_name,city_name,com.NAME,order_num from np_gift_order o LEFT JOIN np_customer c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN np_gift gift ON gift.gift_id = o.temp1 LEFT JOIN np_sys_city city ON city.city_id = o.shopping_city LEFT JOIN np_sys_province pro ON pro.province_id = o.shopping_province LEFT JOIN np_sys_district dis ON dis.district_id = o.shopping_county LEFT JOIN NP_SYS_LOGISTICS_COMPANY com ON com.LOG_COM_ID = o.temp2 where 1=1 and o.del_flag='0' and gift_order_id =#{giftOrderId}

select
from np_gift_order where gift_order_code = #{giftOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flag='0'
select count(1) from np_gift_order where gift_order_code = #{giftOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flag='0'
